name: Men I Save
description:
Hello Adam! And everyone!

"Men I Save" is where your favorite band "Men I Trust" (Check them out! they're really good) are scattered and locked away in old computers. You have to save them by entering each computer and getting them out! ❄

When you save all three you can enjoy something special in the end! ;D ❄

Merry Christmas everyone! ❄

I joined the Secret Santa game jam! and I got to be a Santa 🎅 for "Adam" and I'm happy I got to make this game and that I learned about Men I Trust! I hope this is a good gift! ❄ 🎁

Controls:

The rest of the controls are mentioned in game! but really everything in game can be done with movement and the Interact button!

KeyboardGamepad (XBOX)MoveWASD/ArrowsAnalog stickInteractEA

All of the art, music, and code was made by me! You can check out more of my games on my itch page~ 

Music was made using LMMS! and SFX were made using BFxr!

You can listen to the OST below! 

Again! Merry Christmas! <3 🎄❄🎅

Nader · Men I Save Original Soundtrack
